statements: UPDATE FinancialData SET amount = 500.25, merchant = 'Amazon' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE FinancialData SET account_name = 'John Doe', fraud_flag = true WHERE account_number = '1234567890';
UPDATE FinancialData SET amount = 1000.00, transaction_date = '2022-01-15', merchant = 'Starbucks' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE FinancialData SET account_name = 'John Doe', transaction_type = 'Purchase', fraud_flag = TRUE WHERE account_number = '123456789';
UPDATE fraud_detection SET transaction_amount = 1000.50, transaction_date = '2022-02-15' WHERE transaction_id = 'a1b2c3d4-1234-5678-90ab-cdef12345678';
UPDATE user_profile SET full_name = 'Alice Smith', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE user_id = 'e5f6g7h8-9876-5432-10fe-dcba98765432';
UPDATE fraud_detection SET transaction_amount = 1000.50, transaction_date = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profile SET full_name = 'John Doe', address = '123 Main Street', phone_number = '555-123-4567' WHERE user_id = '8defbdfd-b9b4-4df0-ae5e-3ff522610bd4';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 50.00 WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username', email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_type = 'urgent', description = 'Urgent alert message!' WHERE alert_id = 2;
UPDATE fraudulent_transactions SET amount = 1500.0, fraud_score = 80 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_accounts SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE account_id = 100;
UPDATE fraudulent_transactions SET fraud_score = 90 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE user_accounts SET registration_date = '2022-09-20 10:30:00' WHERE account_id = 2005;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = 1500 WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 250.75, transaction_date = '2022-09-23' WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount - 500 WHERE transaction_id = 2;
